name: Tom Kha Kai
recipeIngredient: 200g chicken breast (cut into very thin pieces),
2 tbsp tamarind juice or 1 tbsp tamarind concentrate,
1 stalk lemongrass (lightly crushed, then sliced diagonally),
2 long red chillies (lightly crushed, then sliced).
recipeInstructions: 1. Put the coconut milk in a saucepan and bring to a boil over a medium heat.
2. Add galangal and reduce to a low heat. Simmer until the milk is fragrant.
3. Add chicken and mushrooms. Increase to a medium heat and cook until the chicken is done.
4. Season with sugar, tamarind juice, lime juice and fish sauce. Add torn kaffir lime leaves and lemongrass. Bring to the boil, then turn off the heat.
5. Ladle into serving bowls. Add the chilli, kaffir lime leaves, coriander and lemongrass.
